title: Financial Futures Ltd Liability Co. Purchases 687 Shares of Meta Platforms, Inc. $META
text: Financial Futures Ltd Liability Co. boosted its position in shares of Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ: META) by 159.4% during the undefined quarter, according to its most recent Form 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission. The institutional investor owned 1,118 shares of the social networking company's stock after acquiring an additional 687

title: The Stock Market Faces Make-or-Break Tests: The Fed's Interest-Rate Decision and Earnings From Alphabet, Amazon, Apple, Meta, and Microsoft
text: The S&P 500 has been in a bull market for more than three years, but the stock market could stumble, depending on the outcome of several important events this week. The Federal Reserve will announce its interest-rate decision on Wednesday, and five big technology companies will report earnings on Wednesday and Thursday.

title: Meta earnings preview: tech titan expected to face cash crunch by 2027
text: Arete's senior tech analyst Rocco Strauss says Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ: META) could “run out of cash and tap into the net debt territory” within the next two years. His remarks arrive only hours before the tech behemoth is scheduled to report its fiscal Q3 results.

title: The ‘Magnificent Seven' have never been this important to the stock market — and a big test lies ahead
text: The stock market is getting ever-more reliant on the “Magnificent Seven,” raising the stakes for a jam-packed week of technology earnings that could decide whether Wall Street's momentum has more room to run.

title: 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks That Could Help Make You a Fortune
text: Quantum computers may be essential to the next generation of AI programs. Palantir is using AI to rake in government and commercial contracts.

title: Why Stocks Are Set to Melt Up Despite Investor Fear
text: Despite investor fears, US stocks are primed to melt up into the historically strong fourth quarter. Easing trade fears, a Dovish Fed, and robust earnings are bullish tailwinds for stocks into year-end.

title: Big Tech earnings this week: What investors should expect
text: With five of the Big Tech giants reporting this week, Jessica Inskip weighs in on what the numbers could mean for AI demand and the market rally. Transcript: Caroline Woods: In terms of tech earnings, we have five of the big 7 on deck this week.

title: Meta Platforms Stock Rallying Ahead of Earnings
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META) is one of the many Big Tech names reporting earnings this week.

title: Meta's Ad Business Is Booming, But One Analyst Says The Real Story Is A $100 Billion AI Bet
text: Meta Platforms Inc‘s (NASDAQ:META) robust advertising tech and artificial intelligence infrastructure will deliver another strong quarter, one analyst says.

title: Dutch court gives Meta more time to change timeline settings
text: A Dutch court on Tuesday gave Meta Platforms until the end of the year to provide Facebook and Instagram users with a simpler way to opt out of algorithmically curated timelines — the kind that show recommended content based on user profiling.

title: Snap CEO Evan Spiegel: Meta's glasses are what we built 10 years ago
text: Snap CEO Evan Spiegel sits down with CNBC's Sara Eisen at the Future Investment Initiative 2025 conference in Riyadh to discuss Snapchat's global growth, why he believes the company's augmented-reality glasses give Snap a technological edge over rivals, and much more.

title: Meta Q3 Earnings: Can Meta Justify Its Massive AI Bet?
text: Meta Platform's earnings report is a critical event to watch not just for investors but for the market in general. Wednesday's earnings report should provide clues about how much AI can drive growth.

title: Meta Platforms Earnings: Watch These Key Metrics
text: Beloved Mag 7 member Meta Platforms is on the reporting docket this week. These are the key metrics worth paying attention to.

title: Meta's earnings are on deck. These are the four biggest numbers to watch.
text: When Meta reports earnings on Wednesday, investors should focus on its capital-spending forecast, ad revenue, engagement trends and holiday-quarter expectations.

title: Why Investors Need to Take Advantage of These 2 Computer and Technology Stocks Now
text: Finding stocks expected to beat quarterly earnings estimates becomes an easier task with our Zacks Earnings ESP.

title: I want to hear Meta's Zuckerberg talk about competitive advantage, says Jim Cramer
text: CNBC's Jim Cramer discusses the day's market action, the stocks he's watching ahead of a big earnings week and more.

title: Strauss: Meta could run out of cash and tap net debt territory by 2027
text: Rocco Strauss, Analyst at Arete, warns Meta faces cash strain by 2027, Amazon is best cushioned in an AI downturn, and Nvidia and Core risk the most if AI investment or demand falters.

title: 3 Stocks to Buy if We Are in An Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock Market Bubble
text: Amazon has multiple businesses that would be unaffected if an AI bubble bursts. Most of Alphabet's revenue comes from its Google Search engine, which is in great shape.

title: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Amazon Weighs Biggest Corporate Layoff Yet
text: Amazon (AMZN) plans to cut 30,000 corporate jobs, about 10% of its professional workforce, to reduce expenses after pandemic overhiring. Meta, Snap, and TikTok (BDNCE) will comply with Australia's under-16 social media ban, effective December 10, facing significant fines for non-compliance.

title: Meta's AI app has seen growth soar since launch of Vibes, but trails OpenAI's Sora
text: The Meta AI app has seen a major jolt in downloads since the company launched the Vibes feed of video generated by artificial intelligence. Meta has boosted Vibes' visibility by paying creators to produce a consistent stream of AI-generated videos, according to people familiar with the matter.
